Title: Relates to contingent fee rules for attorneys in claims or actions for medical, dental or podiatric malpractice
Summary: Updates contingent fee rules for attorneys in claims or actions for medical, dental or podiatric malpractice; permits applications for enhanced fees; permits plaintiffs to waive contingent retainer limitations.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the judiciary law, in relation to reform and update contingent fee rules for attorneys in claims or actions for medical, dental or podiatric malpractice
